job0Bullet0: I'll be standing where l belong. Between you and the peopIe of Gotham.
job0Bullet1: Behind you, stands a symbol of oppression. Blackgate Prison, where a thousand men have languished under the name of this man: Harvey Dent.
job0Bullet2: But no ordinary child, a child born in hell, forged from suffering, hardened by pain. Not a man from privilege.
job1Bullet0: Peace has cost you your strength. Victory has defeated you.
job2Bullet0: Gordon... You do like to play things pretty close to the chest.
job2Bullet1: I can't do that as Bruce Wayne... as a man. I'm flesh and blood.
job2Bullet2: I can be incorruptible, I can be everlasting.
